attributes.action: Introduce colossal life-changing activities to the National Curriculum!
attributes.additional_details: These changes will reduce carbon footprint and go a long way towards meeting and surpassing green targets and foster respect and sustainability for a healthier place to live. Moreover, children’s well-being will be improved and gain a whole new set of social and moral values.
attributes.background: Let us have a debate about introducing colossal life-changing activities to the National Curriculum!  We would like to see a series of practical activities to become a greener and healthier place to live.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to what children are taught in school, but we're not sure exactly what you'd want children to be taught about.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
